DPPH radical scavenging activity was determined as described by [ 26]. Briefly, 1 mL of 0.135 mM DPPH radical (prepared with methanol in an opaque bottle) was added to 1.25 mL of the extracts and standards (gallic acid and rutin), each at varying concentration levels (0.0025 mg/mL to 0.01 mg/mL). The solution was vortexed and kept in dark condition at 25°C for 30 minutes. Absorbance was spectrophotometrically measured at 517 nm with methanol as blank.
